# Factorials

1!  = 1
2!  = 2
3!  = 6
4!  = 24
5!  = 120
6!  = 720
7!  = 5,040
8!  = 40,320
9!  = 362,880
10! = 3,628,800
11! = 39,916,800

13! = 6,227,020,800
